title: Vigilante Shit
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:00.08] Draw the cat eye, sharp enough to kill a man
[00:05.68] You did some bad things, but I'm the worst of them
[00:11.60] Sometimes I wonder which one will be your last lie
[00:17.93] They say looks can kill and I might try
[00:23.17] I don't dress for women
[00:25.96] I don't dress for men
[00:28.26] Lately I've been dressing for revenge
[00:33.31] I don't start it but I can tell you how it ends
[00:38.94] Don't get sad, get even
[00:43.72] So on the weekends
[00:47.27] I don't dress for friends
[00:49.41] Lately I've been dressing for revenge
[00:53.85] She needed cold hard proof so I gave her some
[00:59.68] She had the envelope, where you think she got it from?
[01:06.33] Now she gets the house, gets the kids, gets the pride
[01:12.59] Picture me thick as thieves with your ex-wife
[01:16.75] And she looks so pretty
[01:19.66] Driving in your Benz
[01:22.31] Lately she's been dressing for revenge
[01:27.18] She don't start it, but she can tell you how it ends
[01:32.87] Don't get sad, get even
[01:37.69] So on the weekends
[01:40.81] She don't dress for friends
[01:43.10] Lately she's been dressing for revenge
[01:47.92] Ladies always rise above
[01:51.19] Ladies know what people want
[01:53.76] Someone sweet and kind and fun
[01:56.62] The lady simply had enough
[02:01.93] While he was doing lines
[02:04.85] And crossing all of mine
[02:07.00] Someone told his white collar crimes to the FBI
[02:13.61] And I don't dress for villains
[02:16.84] Or for innocents
[02:19.20] I'm on my vigilante shh again
[02:24.25] I don't start it, but I can tell you how it ends
[02:29.52] Don't get sad, get even
[02:34.97] So on the weekends
[02:38.01] I don't dress for friends
[02:40.43] Lately I've been dressing for revenge
[02:42.03]
